properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
EQUATORIAL GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 02-25.00N 008-24.00E AT
   120250Z DEC. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO MICA CENTER,
   PHONE: 332 9814 9917,
   E-MAIL: MICA-WATCHKEEPER.FCT@DEF.GOUV.FR.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 150540Z DEC 22.
